name: CheckboxListTile
desc: A [ListTile] with a [Checkbox]. In other words, a checkbox with a label.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: Whether this checkbox is checked.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the value of the checkbox should change.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color to use when this checkbox is checked.

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: The color that fills the checkbox.

fields.name: checkColor
fields.desc: The color to use for the check icon when this checkbox is checked.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.checkbox.hoverColor}

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: The color for the checkbox's [Material].

fields.name: splashRadius
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.checkbox.splashRadius}

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.checkbox.materialTapTargetSize}

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: Defines how compact the list tile's layout will be.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.ListTile.shape}

fields.name: side
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.checkbox.side}

fields.name: isError
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.checkbox.isError}

fields.name: tileColor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.ListTile.tileColor}

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The primary content of the list tile.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.desc: Additional content displayed below the title.

fields.name: secondary
fields.desc: A widget to display on the opposite side of the tile from the checkbox.

fields.name: isThreeLine
fields.desc: Whether this list tile is intended to display three lines of text.

fields.name: dense
fields.desc: Whether this list tile is part of a vertically dense list.

fields.name: selected
fields.desc: Whether to render icons and text in the [activeColor].

fields.name: controlAffinity
fields.desc: Where to place the control relative to the text.

fields.name: contentPadding
fields.desc: Defines insets surrounding the tile's contents.

fields.name: tristate
fields.desc: If true the checkbox's [value] can be true, false, or null.

fields.name: checkboxShape
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.checkbox.shape}

fields.name: selectedTileColor
fields.desc: If non-null, defines the background color when [CheckboxListTile.selected] is true.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.inkwell.onFocusChange}

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.ListTile.enableFeedback}

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Whether the CheckboxListTile is interactive.

fields.name: internalAddSemanticForOnTap
fields.desc: Whether to add button:true to the semantics if onTap is provided. This is a temporary flag to help changing the behavior of ListTile onTap semantics.

fields.name: checkboxScaleFactor
fields.desc: Controls the scaling factor applied to the [Checkbox] within the [CheckboxListTile].

fields.name: checkboxSemanticLabel
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.checkbox.semanticLabel}
